Austria Lottery

Official Lottery Website  -  Win Your Daily Lucky Numbers.

Welcome to Austria Lottery, an legal lottery information site that provide lottery and such games results. As a member of the global lottery industry, the Lottery has a long history of being a strong supporter and promoter of responsible gaming.

Austria Lottery offers superlotto games for entertainment and encourages players to enjoy them responsibly. This website is for the use of adults only. Individuals must be 18 years of age or older to participate in lottery, charitable gaming and in-store sports betting.

*This website is for the use of adults only. Individuals must be 18 years of age or older to participate in lottery, charitable gaming and in-store sports betting.
